lead_paragraph: Out of shape and preparing to serve a four-game suspension, Buffalo Bills running back Karlos Williams is apologetic when bluntly assessing the fix he's put himself in.

headline.print_headline: Bills' Karlos Williams Blames Himself for Offseason Troubles
headline.main: Bills' Karlos Williams Blames Himself for Offseason Troubles

snippet: Out of shape and preparing to serve a four-game suspension, Buffalo Bills running back Karlos Williams is apologetic when bluntly assessing the fix he's put himself in....
